actions.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Miller (CA).
On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 202 - 218 (Roll No. 281).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to require the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the feasibility of various alternatives for restoring the Salton Sea, California.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to authorize a feasibility study of various alternatives for restoring the Salton Sea.
